content:
It’s time to kick off Europe’s lead in Artificial Intelligence!

Join us at the European Vision for AI 2021 event organized by ICT-48 VISION Project consortium.

:time: Thursday 22 April 2021 - 11:00-13:00 CET.

:point_right: Attend and learn more via the link: https://www.vision4ai.eu/
:exclamation: For free, no prior registration needed.

FB Event: https://www.facebook.com/events/2930544067185131

Within the 2 hours, you will receive all necessary information on European excellence in AI.
Meet the members of the European AI community and get the chance to discuss with the AI scientists, leaders and opinion makers directly.
And do not miss the first occasion to get an immediate reaction of the main stakeholders on the regulatory framework introduced by the European Commission on 21 April 2021!

European Vision for AI 2021
Causes event by CIIRC on Thursday, April 22 2021

Dear entrepreneurs, we have reached Chapter 100 of our Corporate Innovation program and we have a great presentation prepared for you. We invited Mabel Gisela Torres, Minister of Science, Technology and Innovation, to talk about two very relevant calls for scientific and technological innovations.
Thursday 7:00 pm.

https://p4s.co/news/avances-de-ciencia-y-tecnologia-en-las-regiones/

Avances de Ciencia y Tecnología en las regiones del país
Este jueves 15 de abril, tendremos la presencia de la Ministra de Ciencia, Tecnología e Innovación, Mabel Gisela Torres Torres, y así poder conocer los desarrollos y las oportunidades para las innovaciones de base científica y tecnológica en las diferentes regiones del país.

:tada:CLAIRE is at HannoverMesse2021 !

Have you already seen what the CLAIRE Innovation network is all about? https://bit.ly/3gbd9oH

Do not miss Philipp Slusallek, Director of Strategy at CLAIRE, speak live about this initiative tomorrow at 15:00.

HANNOVER MESSE Product 2021: The CLAIRE Innovation Network (DFKI)
The Confederation of Laboratories for Artificial Intelligence Research in Europe (CLAIRE AISBL) was created in 2018 by the European AI community seeking to strengthen European excellence in AI research and innovation, with a human-centred focus. CLAIRE stands for AI that benefits society, in particular ...

:grey_question: Where does European AI stand in the global context?
:grey_question: Why shall AI matter to European citizens & companies?
:grey_question: How will new EU regulations on AI affect citizens & industries?

Learn all of this and more at the European Vision for AI 2021 Event.

Watch online: https://event.vision4ai.eu

Vision.png

Do not miss one of the first opportunities to discuss the EU Commission’s latest plans for “AI made in Europe”! Attend the European Vision for AI 2021 Event, meet the European AI Community, and take part in exciting discussions on future topics via live Q&A .

:point_right: Today 11:00 CET at https://event.vision4ai.eu
vision
